sense.gloss: to do, to carry out, to perform
to cause to become, to make (into), to turn (into)
to serve as, to act as, to work as
to wear (clothes, a facial expression, etc.)
to judge as being, to view as being, to think of as, to treat as, to use as
to be sensed (of a smell, noise, etc.)
to be (in a state, condition, etc.)
to place, or raise, person A to a post or status B
to transform A to B, to make A into B, to exchange A for B
to make use of A for B, to view A as B, to handle A as if it were B
verbalizing suffix (applies to nouns noted in this dictionary with the part of speech "vs")
creates a humble verb (after a noun prefixed with "o" or "go")
to be just about to, to be just starting to, to try to, to attempt to

sdata.j: すぐに↑諦↑↓あきら↓めて↑昼寝↑↓ひるね↓を|する|かも↑知↑↓し↓れない。
sdata.e: I may give up soon and just nap instead.

sdata.j: いつまでかかっても↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓を↑説明↑↓せつめい↓|する|のは↑無理↑↓むり↓だ。
sdata.e: It would take forever for me to explain everything.

sdata.j: ↑自分勝手↑↓じぶんがって↓に|する|つもりはない。
sdata.e: I don't intend to be selfish.

sdata.j: それを|する|ためには↑危険↑↓きけん↓を↑冒↑↓おか↓さなければならない。
sdata.e: In order to do that, you have to take risks.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓にそれに↑関↑↓かん↓|する|↑理論↑↓りろん↓をもっていると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think I have a theory about that.

sdata.j: ウィキペディアでいつかバイアグラを↑検索↑↓けんさく↓|する|なんて↑思↑↓おも↓ってもみなかったわ。
sdata.e: I wouldn't have thought I would someday look up "Viagra" in Wikipedia.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑邪魔↑↓じゃま↓|する|くらいなら↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑数↑↓すう↓↑独↑↓どく↓をやってるよ。
sdata.e: I will play Sudoku then instead of continuing to bother you.

sdata.j: ログアウト|する|んじゃなかったよ。
それを|する|より↑他↑↓ほか↓はない。
sdata.e: I have nothing better to do.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓でどれほどのことが↑学↑↓まな↓べるか、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓でもびっくり|する|はずだよ！
sdata.e: You'd be surprised what you can learn in a week.
